input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Double the fun with this shaper cutter! The Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore is the perfect accessory for your woodworking projects. Made with high-quality C-2 carbide, this cutter is durable and reliable. It's a versatile tool that can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics, making it a great addition to any workshop. The double lock miter allows for precise control, and the 3/4-inch bore is compatible with most shapers. Use this cutter at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm for optimal performance.
input_text.Response B:
Sing like a professional!
Your favorite new toy for karaoke! The Universal Mini Microphone is a versatile device that can be used with multiple singing applications. It's compatible with your smartphone and easy to use. Whether you're recording or streaming karaoke, this microphone will capture your voice with crystal-clear clarity. It's small enough to carry around with you anywhere, so you can sing whenever and wherever inspiration strikes. The microphone also has a built-in volume control, so you can adjust the recording levels to your liking. Get ready to make some noise!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B has nothing to do with the product!
